title: Directive Zero Unleashed
outcome: A secret failsafe called Directive Zero, left by Halden, suddenly activates, locking all Council factions and BCI managers out of the system. BCI enforcement and monitoring collapse, public amnesty spreads, and a citywide vote is demanded to decide Stenograd’s fate. The Council’s grip on power dissolves as the population grapples with mass uncertainty and opportunity.

events.description: All BCI monitors and enforcement mechanisms halt without warning. Citizens receive anonymous notifications, declaring that all scoring and surveillance have paused under 'Directive Zero.'
Council members urgently summon experts to override the lockdown but are denied access. Panic spreads among political elite as BCI data streams go dark for the first time in years.

Anonymous broadcasts invite all citizens to participate in an open vote: should Stenograd restore BCI, reform it, or dismantle automated governance entirely? Streets fill with candid debate and new political energy.
Council attempts to sway public opinion with propaganda campaigns. Many BCI administrators defect, refusing to reinstate control, insisting the decision must be democratic.
Voting concludes as citizens choose partial restoration with strict transparency. The Council, weakened and discredited, is forced to accept new limitations.
